main event: A civilian reported seeing a bright silver white object in the sky in Virginia Beach on 23 September 1957.
interesting points: The object lit up brilliantly for several seconds., The object was described as round and silver white., It moved rapidly to the east., A check with the balloon schedule eliminated balloon as a suspect for the sighting., The report received from Mr. June at Naval Air Station Oceana provided detailed observations.
sighted object: a round, bright silver white object
